name: material-cards
description: Material card component with vanilla JavaScript and local SVG icons

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: sass --no-source-map scss/material-cards.scss dist/material-cards.css && sass --no-source-map scss/material-cards-auto-height.scss dist/material-cards-auto-height.css
scripts.build:vnext: npm run build -w @material-cards/core && npm run build -w @material-cards/react && npm run build -w @material-cards/vue && npm run build -w @material-cards/svelte
scripts.typecheck:vnext: npm run typecheck -w @material-cards/core && npm run typecheck -w @material-cards/react && npm run typecheck -w @material-cards/vue && npm run typecheck -w @material-cards/svelte
scripts.smoke:next: npm --prefix examples/next-demo install && npm --prefix examples/next-demo run build
scripts.smoke:vue: npm --prefix examples/vue-demo install && npm --prefix examples/vue-demo run build
scripts.smoke:sveltekit: npm --prefix examples/sveltekit-demo install && npm --prefix examples/sveltekit-demo run build
scripts.smoke:vnext: npm run build:vnext && npm run smoke:next && npm run smoke:vue && npm run smoke:sveltekit
